fields.name: i
javadoc: an array of the input slot indices

fields.name: k
javadoc: an array of the output slot indices

fields.name: l
javadoc: The ItemStacks currently placed in the slots of the brewing stand

fields.name: q
javadoc: an integer with each bit specifying whether that slot of the stand contains a potion

fields.name: r
javadoc: used to check if the current ingredient has been removed from the brewing stand during brewing

methods.name: a
javadoc: Returns the stack in the given slot.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Removes up to a specified number of items from an inventory slot and returns them in a new stack.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Sets the given item stack to the specified slot in the inventory (can be crafting or armor sections).

methods.name: a
javadoc: Returns true if automation can insert the given item in the given slot from the given side.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Don't rename this method to canInteractWith due to conflicts with Container

methods.name: b
javadoc: Returns the number of slots in the inventory.

methods.name: b
javadoc: Removes a stack from the given slot and returns it.

methods.name: b
javadoc: Returns true if automation is allowed to insert the given stack (ignoring stack size) into the given slot. For guis use Slot.isItemValid

methods.name: b
javadoc: Returns true if automation can extract the given item in the given slot from the given side.

methods.name: f
javadoc: Creates an array of boolean values, each value represents a potion input slot, value is true if the slot is not null.
